bibl.title: New Coins in the Sixth Section of the Egyptian Museum-Cairo.
bibl.note: 53 Byzantine golden coins (from a collection of artifacts confiscated in 1997 after an illegal attempt to get them out of Egypt).

bibl.title: Studi di Egittologia e di Antichità puniche

bibl.seg: MOHAMED Kholoud Ahmed, New Coins in the Sixth Section of the Egyptian Museum-Cairo.
Studi di Egittologia e di Antichità puniche 18 (1998) pp. 7-21, 7 pll.
53 Byzantine golden coins (from a collection of artifacts confiscated in 1997 after an illegal attempt to get them out of Egypt).
